explanation: [0-0] In a store, three people are standing outside the counter. On the left is a man in white, in the middle is a woman in a yellow top and jeans, and on the right is a man in a black top and jeans. Two staff members in black are standing behind the counter. Behind the man in black is a black spring-loaded chair.

[0-7] As the man in black sits down on the chair, a green arrow points at him. The man turns his body, and suddenly the chair collapses. Then, the man covers his buttocks with his hand and stands up in pain. An iron bar appears, piercing through the middle of the chair. The man behind the counter and his companion look at the man. The woman in yellow looks down and notices the bar on the chair, dropping her ice cream on the floor. The man behind the counter also notices the iron bar and rubs his hair in frustration. Then, the man in white also turns to look at the chair with the iron bar.
